name: d3-voronoi-scatterplot
description: d3 scatterplot visualization with a distance-limited voronoi overlay for improved tooltip interaction

scripts.prepublish: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)" -- index.js
scripts.test: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)" -- index.js && cp build/bundle.js ~/workspace/d3-voronoi-scatterplot-example-project/02/d3-voronoi-scatterplot.js && cp build/bundle.js ~/workspace/visualizations/residuals/vis/06/src/d3-voronoi-scatterplot.js
